title: Intersection of Two Arrays II - Hash Table - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given two arrays, write a function to compute their intersection. Example 1: Input: nums1 = [1,2,2,1], nums2 = [2,2]
Output: [2,2]

content:

title: Valid Anagram - Hash Table - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given two strings s and t , write a function to determine if t is an anagram of s. Example 1: Input: s = "anagram", t = "nagaram"
Output: true
Example 2: Input: s = "rat", t = "car"
Output: false

title: Isomorphic Strings - Hash Table - Easy - LeetCode
content:

title: Count Primes - Hash Table - Easy - LeetCode
content:

title: Happy Number - Hash Table - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Write an algorithm to determine if a number n is "happy".

title: Sum of All Odd Length Subarrays - Array - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given an array of positive integers arr, calculate the sum of all possible odd-length subarrays. A subarray is a contiguous subsequence of the array. Return the sum of all odd-length subarrays of arr.   Example 1: Input: arr = [1,4,2,5,3]
Output: 58

title: Special Positions in a Binary Matrix - Array - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given a rows x cols matrix mat, where mat[i][j] is either 0 or 1, return the number of special positions in mat.
A position (i,j) is called special if mat[i][j] == 1 and all other elements in row i and column j are 0 (rows and columns are 0-indexed).

title: Detect Pattern of Length M Repeated K or More Times - Array - Easy - LeetCode
content:
Given an array of positive integers arr,  find a pattern of length m that is repeated k or more times.
